Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs) are clean electrochemical conversion devices that can flexibly operate between solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) patterns.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Ca3Co4O9+delta (CCO) mate-rial with a misfit-layered structure was successfully prepared and fully discussed as a oxygen electrode for RSOCs.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The CCO electrode showed superior durability and excellent electrocatalytic activity for oxygen reac-tions.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Both the ohmic and polarization resistances were decreased after alternating anodic and cathodic polar-ization for more than 100 h, demonstrated the activation of CCO electrode and an improvement of electrode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The peak power density of the single cell with CCO oxygen electrode was 614 mW.cm(-2) after polarization at 500 mA.cm(-2) for 4 hat 750 degrees C, which improved by 4 times than the unpo-larized cell.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The maximum electrolysis current density of 749 mA.cm(-2) was obtained at 800 degrees C and 50 % water vapor, which corresponded to the hydrogen production rate of 311 mL.cm(-2)h(-1).
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Results showed that CCO with good reversible polarization performance and long-term stability was a prospective oxygen electrode for RSOCs.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics of Ca3Co4O9+6 oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells
